translated: The Triad on the UnconditionedğŸ”½An unarisen unconditioned element is a condition, as object condition, for an unarisen unconditioned element. In the triad, there are four in object condition, three in predominance condition, and four in support condition.

An arisen unconditioned element is a condition, as object condition, for an unarisen unconditioned element. An arisen unconditioned element is a condition, as object condition, for an unarisen unconditioned element. In the triad, there are two in object condition, one in predominance condition, and two in support condition.
